slice: Distribution of reactions by type and friend
params:
{
  "outerRadius" : 77,
  "show_total" : true,
  "show_labels_threshold" : 0.5,
  "show_legend" : true,
  "label_type" : "key_percent",
  "viz_type" : "pie",
  "groupby" : [ "reaction_sender_name", "reaction" ],
  "show_labels" : true,
  "labels_outside" : true,
  "legendType" : "scroll",
  "legendOrientation" : "top",
  "sort_by_metric" : true,
  "adhoc_filters" : [ {
    "operator" : "==",
    "comparator" : true,
    "clause" : "WHERE",
    "subject" : "has_reaction",
    "operatorId" : "IS_TRUE",
    "expressionType" : "SIMPLE"
  }, {
    "operator" : "==",
    "comparator" : true,
    "clause" : "WHERE",
    "subject" : "has_reel",
    "operatorId" : "IS_TRUE",
    "expressionType" : "SIMPLE"
  }, {
    "operator" : "IN",
    "comparator" : [ "%{reaction_sender_name}" ],
    "clause" : "WHERE",
    "subject" : "reaction_sender_name",
    "operatorId" : "IN",
    "expressionType" : "SIMPLE"
  }, {
    "comparator" : "Last year",
    "operator" : "TEMPORAL_RANGE",
    "expressionType" : "SIMPLE",
    "subject" : "upsert_date",
    "clause" : "WHERE"
  }, {
    "operator" : "==",
    "comparator" : "%{chat_id}",
    "clause" : "WHERE",
    "subject" : "chat_id",
    "operatorId" : "EQUALS",
    "expressionType" : "SIMPLE"
  } ],
  "label_line" : true,
  "metric" : {
    "aggregate" : "COUNT",
    "column" : {
      "column_name" : "reaction"
    },
    "label" : "COUNT(reaction)",
    "expressionType" : "SIMPLE"
  },
  "row_limit" : 100,
  "donut" : true,
  "extra_form_data" : { },
  "color_scheme" : "supersetColors",
  "date_format" : "smart_date",
  "innerRadius" : 30,
  "number_format" : "SMART_NUMBER"
}
description: Distribution of reactions by type and friend
